couplesIntel.hint.content: We have averaged the data of all couples that have been interested in your venue to present you with Your Unique Couple Positioning.
couplesIntel.hint.title: Couples intelligence
coupleTargeting.hint.content.supplier: Couples Targeting allows you to reach the ideal couples for your business, based on their wedding preferences and your business goals. Couples provide the below information when they join Bridebook, so we will use this to promote your business to the couples who match your target preferences.
coupleTargeting.hint.content.venue: Couples Targeting helps you reach your ideal couples based on their wedding preferences and your business goals. We use the information couples provide on Bridebook to match them with your venue.
discoveryCall.booking: Book your <1>free discovery call</1> with one of our Venue Specialists, and together let's:
discoveryCall.booking.supplier: Book your <1>free discovery call</1> with one of our Business Specialists, and together let's:
enterPhoneNumber: Enter your phone number and choose a date below.
performance.hint.content: Learn the main reasons why a couple didn't go on to book your venue. Focusing on improving these areas will help you win more business and maximise your bookings from Bridebook. All feedback is anonymous.
performance.hint.title: Lost leads
roiSummary.hint.content: Gain valuable insights into the benefits Bridebook brings to your business with our ROI calculator. This tool helps you measure and appreciate the return on investment you get from using Bridebook.
roiSummary.hint.title: ROI summary
SmeethanQuote: “We joined VenuePro 6 months ago and since then we’ve received 8 bookings. It has been the best decision!”
teamWillBeInTouch: Our team will be in touch to discuss your options to keep your enhanced functionality.
teamWillDiscussUpgrade: Our team will be in touch to discuss your upgrade options.
upgradeOptionAddons.hint.content: Increase your visibility to couples on Bridebook. Expand your reach, stand out from competitors and improve your search position.
upgradeOptionAddons.hint.title: Increase your visibility
weddingFairs.hint.content: Promote your wedding fairs and showrounds on Bridebook. Events you add will be visible on your profile page for all couples. When an event expires you can delete it and replace it with a new one.
weddingFairs.hint.title: Events & wedding fairs
